messages.message:
`manager-dashboard.spec.ts` and `reviewer-dashboard.spec.ts` failed on this run (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11116/overview/e1748005-50a1-4b7d-8420-3946df000f93?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1):
• We need to wait for the search result before getting the `cypress-human-review-deployment` button
• Similarly, we need to wait for the `/deployment/<id>` page to load before getting the "run deployment" button
cc @Udit for tmr :woman-bowing:
It seems getting deployments has become slower (maybe as we add more?) because we're seeing a lot more timeouts due to deployments not loading - I'll follow up on this
this is in the shared cypress workspace so ideally there should not be many but yes i’ll add better waiting in the tests tmrw!
maybe we can also consider creating a new workspace in each test run so that the num of deployments is always very low?
would need to create deployments then each time

review tests ideally have apps and deployments setup, even the fact that review tests have to run a deployment is annoying bc its not what im trying to test but it needs the setup and often times its flaky bc of that setup :joy:
It wouldn't have to do with the # of deployments in the workspace, but the # of deployments in the DB
The issue here and in our other tests is that loading a single deployment is taking a long time
